user.title: Add new sensor
user.description: For more information, see the [documentation](https://github.com/heyajohnny/cryptoinfo). Rate limiting is handled automatically (max 15 requests/minute to CoinGecko).

data_description.currency_name: One of the currency names in [this list](https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/simple/supported_vs_currencies).
data_description.cryptocurrency_ids: The 'id' values from one or more of the coins/tokens in [this list](https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/list), separated by commas.
data_description.unit_of_measurement: Do you want to use a currency symbol? ([Symbol list](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Currency_symbol#List_of_currency_symbols_currently_in_use))
data_description.multipliers: The number of coins/tokens (separated by a comma). The number of multipliers must match the number of cryptocurrency IDs.
data_description.update_frequency: How often should the value be refreshed? Multiple sensors are automatically staggered to avoid CoinGecko rate limits.
